channel.title: CTF Field Guide by Trail of Bits
channel.description:
[Trail of Bits' CTF Field Guide](https://trailofbits.github.io/ctf/index.html)
I think this has been out there for a while. I searched this site and couldn't find anything for this, so I apologize if I am repeating something.
This thing is like a full course....extremely interesting.
BTW, I would recommend some understanding of C, specifically pointers and memory management.

item.title: CTF Field Guide by Trail of Bits

item.description:
